title: Flor de Lis
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Mexican
description: Long-established vegetarian Mexican food restaurant near the University. Serves traditional Mexican dishes, University-style, in a cozy atmosphere. Set menus, a la carte, burgers, and enchiladas. Also hosts vegetarian cooking classes. Location is one block from the Copilco metro station. Best to arrive before 4pm.
streetAddress: Filosofia y Letras 2, Copilco Universidad, Coyoacan
